title: Casey Batchelor shows off her growing baby bump as she does some yoga
text:
She's preparing to welcome her second daughter and has been keeping up with daily yoga sessions throughout her pregnancy.

And Casey Batchelor looked fantastic as she showed off her growing baby bump while filming in Dubai for her yoga app.

The former Big Brother star, 34, was glowing in a tight white top and black leggings with a sheer panel on the leg.

Glowing: Casey Batchelor, 34, looked fantastic in a white t-shirt and black leggings as she showed off her growing baby bump while filming for her yoga app in Dubai

Casey smiled as she took a break from exercising and stopped for a cup of tea in a white mug.

The star, who is already mum to 17-month-old Florence, held her bump as she walked back to her mat and wore her dark locks tied back in a ponytail.

She also sported a neutral palette of makeup with a nude lip and accessorised with a simple necklace and her engagement ring.

Work it: The former Big Brother star appeared relaxed as she showed off her yoga moves on a blue mat

Casey and her fiancé Dane Goodson are set to welcome their second daughter in early 2020.

The former glamour model has previously said she thinks it will be 'nice' for her girls to be close in age.

Casey recently told The Sun: 'It's a girl. Yeah, I'm having another girl which is so lovely because I never had a sister, I had two older brothers and they always had each other. So it will be nice for Florence to have a little sister.'

Waiting for baby: Casey, pictured at Sopwell House spa in Hertfordshire, and her fiancé Dane Goodson are set to welcome their second daughter in early 2020

The news the couple are expecting a girl came as a surprise to Casey, who had been convinced by friends and family that she would have a boy.

Casey admitted she and Dane will continue trying for a son once their little girl has been born.

She said: 'I was adamant I was having a boy, everyone convinced me. [They said] 'You’re carrying differently, and you’re all at the front, with a girl it’s at the back.'

'Dane's so happy that he’s having a little girl, but he would like a little boy obviously. If we had a boy this time, we would have the choice if we wanted to go again, but because we’re having a girl we’ll definitely try again.'

Doting mother: Casey said she was surprised to find out she was having another baby girl and will keep on trying for a boy

Casey announced the couple were expecting their second child in Closer magazine, saying: 'I'm going to have two babies 20 months apart… I can' t quite believe it!

'It’ll be tough, but I’m going to ride the storm – we’re just so thrilled we’re having another baby!

'Dane and I wanted more children – we’re both turning 35 and we got engaged in January, so we didn’t want to wait much longer, as time is ticking on.

'We decided to start trying, and I got pregnant straight away. I do feel very lucky.'
description: The former Big Brother star, 34, looked fantastic in a white t-shirt and black leggings as she filmed for her yoga app in Dubai.
